# receiver

**Instance Property**

A pointer of type [doc://com.apple.objectivec/documentation/ObjectiveC/objc_object]. Specifies an instance of a class.

## Declaration

```swift
var receiver: Unmanaged<AnyObject>
```

## Fields

- **super_class**: A pointer to a [doc://com.apple.objectivec/documentation/ObjectiveC/Class] data structure. Specifies the particular superclass of the instance to message.
